text: Marco Aurélio Fernandes da Silva (born 23 September 1977) is a former Brazilian football player. ==Career statistics== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League National Cup League Cup Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Avispa Fukuoka 1998 J1 League 3 0 0 0 0 0 3 0 Kawasaki Frontale 2002 J2 League 2 0 0 0 – 2 0 Total 5 0 0 0 0 0 5 0 ==References== Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Franca
